body:
Hello Mostapha,



I ve been using Ladybug to run some Radiation Analysis,

For some dates, (not all of them), there seems to be some issue with the legend not showing up when I set the Analysis period to be same day from morning till night.

Only the lowest value of the legend appears.



The analysis seems to be running fine, judging from the gradient of the colors.



In this particular example the legend appears for Dec 22nd from 06.00-22.00 but not for other dates like Dec 21 same time period. Sky appears also to be just one color whenever the problem occurs.



I attach the files for your reference.

Thanks a lot,

Dimitris
topic: Ladybug Radiation Analysis Legend not appearing
